snippet: Over 100 Republicans endorsed a challenger for the 2014 race, citing budget and tax cuts that sent the state’s revenues plummeting under the Republican incumbent.
abstract: More than 100 Republican politicians and former elected officials in Kansas endorse Democrat Paul Davis in state's 2014 governor's race, presenting stark challenge to re-election prospects of Republican incumbent Sam Brownback, who has spent most of his term pushing sharply conservative policies.
lead_paragraph: Over 100 Republicans endorsed a challenger for the 2014 race, citing budget and tax cuts that sent the state’s revenues plummeting under the Republican incumbent.

headline.main: Democrat Is Governor Pick of G.O.P. Group in Kansas
headline.print_headline: Democrat Is Governor Pick of G.O.P. Group in Kansas
